content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||54px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Help homeless and low-income families regain their independence. We offer many opportunities to make a difference in the lives of the families we serve.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Victoria1-3.jpg” alt=”Family Promise family” title_text=”Victoria1-3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”VOLUNTEER” url=”/get-involved/volunteer/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/FamilyPromiseSummitNJ-06164-1-3.jpg” alt=”FP volunteers” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/get-involved/volunteer/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Volunteers are the backbone of our programs. Prepare a meal. Read a story. Help write a resume. Offer compassion and support. Even an hour of volunteering can change lives.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”BECOME A PARTNER” url=”/who-we-are/partners/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/FP-Belk-2.jpg” alt=”FP Partner Belk” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/partners/” link_option_url_new_window=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Company-tailored volunteer programs, event sponsorships, and cause-marketing relationships provide a way to help families in need, boost employee pride, and enhance corporate presence.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”JOIN THE PROMISE GUILD” url=”/donate/join-the-promise-guild/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Garden-party-12.jpg” alt=”Promise Guild” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/donate/join-the-promise-guild/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Promise Guild members help children and families avoid or recover from homelessness every month with an automatic recurring gift to Family Promise.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”BECOME AN AFFILIATE” url=”/what-we-do/affiliates/become-an-affiliate/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/PIH-Gainesville-FL-2018-13.jpg” _builder_version=”4.11.1″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/affiliates/become-an-affiliate/” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Are you interested in starting a Family Promise Affiliate in your community? We’ll help you with every step of the process, mobilizing local resources and uniting the community in a coordinated effort.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”CREATE A FUNDRAISER” url=”https://donate.familypromise.org/my-FP-Fundraiser” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Garden-party-5a.jpg” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”https://donate.familypromise.org/my-FP-Fundraiser” link_option_url_new_window=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hold one of our signature events as a fundraiser. We take the guesswork out of planning and execution by sharing best practices and customizable templates for Charity Walks, Golf Outings and Box Cities.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”JOIN OUR TEAM” url=”/get-involved/employment/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/team.jpg” alt=”Our Team” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”a693ea36-2f41-46b9-a727-d5d3b27be1db” link_option_url=”/get-involved/employment/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Working at a Family Promise Affiliate provides an exciting opportunity to make a difference for families and gain experience in the nonprofit sector. View our most recent opportunities to join our team.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
